name: Naughty Cats
description:
Naughty Cat is a 2D platformer game inspired by Angry Birds made by Game Design Master's students from Aalto University. Instead of shooting birds to attach pigs, the naught cats are attacking the birds. Why? No reason, cats are just being cats!

Made by 

Boeun Kim - Art
Ida Iskala - Programming
Aliinsti Noguest - Programming
Vesa Saarinen - Sound
